mapper.sql: id, material_id, user_id, attr_name, attr_code, statue, creator, created, modifier, modifior
mapper.insert: insert into metaral_attr (id, material_id, user_id, attr_name, attr_code, statue, creator, created, modifier, modifior) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{materialId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifior,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
